readable.title: 3537201804_ce07aff237
readable.content: A child spins on a merry-go-round . Childern are playing on a merry go round as adults on a bench watch them . Children play on a merry-go-round as adults look on from a bench . Fathers watch as their children enjoy the spinning merry-go-round . Two kids sit in the middle of a playground toy that spins around them .
